trans-unit.source: A bitmap effect that paints a drop shadow around the target texture.
trans-unit.target: 可在目標材質周圍繪製陰影的點陣圖效果。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Effects.DropShadowEffect" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Effects.DropShadowEffect" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates the radius of the shadow's blur effect.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定表示陰影模糊效果半徑的值。

trans-unit.source: A value that indicates the radius of the shadow's blur effect.
trans-unit.target: 表示陰影模糊效果半徑的值。

trans-unit.source: The default is 5.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 5。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Effects.DropShadowEffect.BlurRadius" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Effects.DropShadowEffect.BlurRadius" /> 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Effects.Effect" /> object, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: 建立這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Effects.Effect" /> 物件的可修改複製品，製作這個物件值的深層複本。

trans-unit.source: When copying this object's dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (which may no longer resolve), but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: 當複製這個物件的相依性屬性時，這個方法會複製資源參考和資料繫結 (但可能已不能再解析)，但不會複製動畫或它們目前的值。

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of this instance.
trans-unit.target: 這個執行個體的可修改複製品。

trans-unit.source: The returned clone is effectively a deep copy of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 傳回的複製品實際上是目前物件的深層複本。

trans-unit.source: The clone's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 複製品的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 屬性為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Effects.Effect" /> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
trans-unit.target: 建立這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Effects.Effect" /> 物件的可修改複製品，製作這個物件目前值的深層複本。

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are copied.
trans-unit.target: 不會複製資源參考、資料繫結和動畫，但是會複製其目前值。

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 目前物件的可修改複本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property will be <see langword="false" /> even if the source's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property was <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 即使來源的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 屬性為 <see langword="false" />，複製物件的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 屬性將仍為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the color of the drop shadow.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定延伸陰影的色彩。

trans-unit.source: The color of the drop shadow.
trans-unit.target: 延伸陰影的色彩。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Colors.Black" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Colors.Black" />。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Effects.DropShadowEffect.Color" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Effects.DropShadowEffect.Color" /> 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the direction of the drop shadow.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定延伸陰影的方向。

trans-unit.source: The direction of the drop shadow, in degrees.
trans-unit.target: 延伸陰影的方向，以度數表示。

trans-unit.source: The default is 315.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 315。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Effects.DropShadowEffect.Direction" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Effects.DropShadowEffect.Direction" /> 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the opacity of the drop shadow.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定延伸陰影的不透明度。

trans-unit.source: The opacity of the drop shadow.
trans-unit.target: 延伸陰影的不透明度。

trans-unit.source: The default is 1.
trans-unit.target: 預設為 1。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Effects.DropShadowEffect.Opacity" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Effects.DropShadowEffect.Opacity" /> 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the system renders the drop shadow with emphasis on speed or quality.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定系統繪製延伸陰影時應著重速度或畫質的值。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Effects.RenderingBias" /> value that indicates whether the system renders the drop shadow with emphasis on speed or quality.
trans-unit.target: 指出系統繪製延伸陰影時應著重速度或畫質的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Effects.RenderingBias" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Media.Effects.RenderingBias.Performance" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Media.Effects.RenderingBias.Performance" />。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Effects.DropShadowEffect.RenderingBias" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Effects.DropShadowEffect.RenderingBias" /> 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the distance of the drop shadow below the texture.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定延伸陰影在紋理下方的距離。

trans-unit.source: The distance of the drop shadow below the texture.
trans-unit.target: 延伸陰影在紋理下方的距離。

trans-unit.source: The default is 5.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 5。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Effects.DropShadowEffect.ShadowDepth" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Effects.DropShadowEffect.ShadowDepth" /> 相依性屬性。
